title: Advancements in food quality monitoring: integrating biosensors for precision detection
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,976-992
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00094C, Review Article

The integration of advanced biosensors enhances the detection of contaminants in food. This approach addresses challenges related to sensitivity, specificity, and environmental factors, ensuring food safety and quality.
